issues.description: The problem statementâ€™s UML and instructions specify that the name getter and setter in the abstract Animal class must have protected visibility, but the solution implementation declares both getName() and setName() as public. This contradicts the encapsulation requirement and may confuse students following the UML diagram.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the declarations of getName() and setName(...) in Animal.java from public to protected so they align with the UML and problem statement guidance.
